concept.title: Bowl Preparation
concept.shortdesc: Below is as guide that tells users how to keep the freezer bowl frozen and how to determine if it is ready for use.

ul.li: Freezer bowl must be completely frozen before the recipe is begun.
Always leave the freezer bowl in the freezer when it isn't in use.
To determine if the bowl is completely frozen, shake it. If you hear liquid moving, then the freezing process isn't complete.
